description: 2 trees located at the land to the east of the address given, 1 immature, recently planted tree to be removed (and replaced as required) and 1 larger tree to the north (Maple) to be trimmed (proposed crown reduction trimming activity) in order to grant access and movement in order to accommodate a 200 T crane for the essential works taking place for the Highbury Corner Bridge replacement on behalf of TfL. The planned works to take place at Christmas require a large crane to be situated at Highbury Place and the current access and swing area is insufficient. In order to prevent damage to the trees - For tree 1 the immature tree is to be removed and replaced as required and for Tree 2 an authorised trimming activity is requested to be completed by the highways department giving sufficient access in order to accommodate the 200 T crane
